Title: Authorizes physicians and pharmacists to enter into comprehensive medication management protocols for their patients
Summary: Authorizes physicians and pharmacists to enter into comprehensive medication management protocols for their patients.
LawCode: Add Art 29-H ยง2999-ee, Pub Health L; add ยง6801-b, Ed L; amd ยง5, Chap 21 of 2011
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law and the education law, in relation to comprehensive medication management; and to amend chapter 21 of the laws of 2011 amending the education law relating to authorizing pharmacists to perform collaborative drug therapy management with physicians in certain settings, in relation to making the provisions of such chapter permanent
